q: Sergio Marchionne has talked of paying the governments back by the end of the year.`` I'd like to pay them off in 2011, if I could,'' Sergio Marchionne told reporters earlier this month. I would like to get it done as quickly as I could. To be sure, the future is not all roses for the company- Magliano notes that while Chrysler's financial position has improved, the progress`` hasn't really show up in sales.''

" Donald Rumsfeld 's paper was given to the White House only two weeks after President Bush had approved a US military operation in Afghanistan directed against Osama bin Laden and the Taliban regime. Despite that decision, Donald Rumsfeld 's proposal called explicitly for postponing indefinitely US airstrikes and the use of ground forces in support of the anti-Taliban Northern Alliance in order to try to catch Osama bin Laden . the Donald Rumsfeld paper argued that the US should target states that had supported anti-Israel forces such as Hezbollah and Hamas.
